name: 李春穎
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
schedule:
1-2週：Kinematics of a particle
3-4週：Kinetics of a particle: Force and acceleration
5-6週：Kinetics of a particle: Work and energy
7週：Mid-term #1
8-9週：Kinetics of a particle: Impulse and momentum
10-11週：Planar kinematics of a rigid body
12-13週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Force and acceleration
14週：Mid-term #2
15-16週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Work and energy
17-18週：Planar kinetics of a rigid body: Impulse and momentum
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
出席及平時表現：10％
期中考＃1：30％
期中考＃2：30％
期末考：30％
materials:
1. Vector Mechanics for Engineers- Dynamics, by Beer, Johnston, et al., 11th edition, McGraw-Hill Pub. Co., 2016
2. Engineering Mechanicas- Dynamics, by Hibbeler, 14/e, 2017, Pearson
